bib.title: Different approaches to groups and key person identification in blogosphere
bib.author: Zygmunt, Anna and Br{\'o}dka, Piotr and Kazienko, Przemyslaw and Kozlak, Jaroslaw
bib.abstract: Two approaches for identifying key persons in the blogosphere-based social network are analysed in the paper: discovery of the most important individuals either in persistent or in global social communities existing on web blogs. A new method for the separation of stable groups fulfilling given conditions is presented. Additionally, a new concept for extraction of user roles and key persons in such groups is proposed. It has been compared to the general clustering method and structural node position measure applied to rank users in the time
bib.booktitle: 2011 International Conference on Advances in Social Networks Analysis and Mining
